scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of about 1200 color slides taken by Mortzschky, a large number of Los Angeles and other areas of California.

p.emph: Description derived from in-house card file.

scopecontent.p: Mortzschky photographed, as a typical tourist, the places he visited and the people around him. A large number of the slides are of Los Angeles and of other places in California.
Mortzschky's index serves as guide to the collection.
